div.p: Pp. 266, 1175, unit 37, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is a printed form (p. 266). The date has been written in, together with details, recorded in the margin and continued on a separate sheet (p. 1175), of publications that were sent together with the standard covering letter to a number of different departments. The file number of the letter sent to M is recorded as 5553.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have the honor, by direction of the Chief Secretary, to transmit herewith the document noted in the margin,
Till Algernes Systematik nya bidrag af J.G. Agardh 1 Caulerpa – 6 copies Acta Universitatis Lundensis Lunds Universitets ars skrift (i.e. Agardh (1873-90), part 1; the part also contained treatments of Zonaria and Sargassum ; ‘1' is repeated in going from one line to the next).
The parts were issued as components of Acta universitatis lundensis , also entitled Lunds universitets Års-skrift , in the series dealing with topics in science and mathematics. A title page and index for the whole work were issued with the final part, part 6, in 1890. See TL2 , title number 62, for details of the volumes and dates of issue. Each part was separately paginated within the relevant volume.
received from the Secretary of State.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: I have the honor to be,
